item.title: What the heck is bitcoin
item.description: This is a very simplified introduction to understanding what bitcoin is, bitcoin itself is not one thing, it can be divided into 3 parts P2P Payment network system Bitcoin as currency Blockchain underlying technology P2P payment system In the current internet age it very simple for use to send an email or file to another person electronically, however if you wanted to some money to a friend this is not possible electronically without a trusted third party, where hand over you personal details get a bank account or sign up to some third party payment system like paypal etc.
